price: Ní ti àwọn tó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, tí wọ́n sì ṣe àwọn iṣẹ́ rere, (Allāhu) máa fún wọn ní ẹ̀san wọn ní kíkún. Allāhu kò sì fẹ́ràn àwọn alábòsí.
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَيُوَفِّيهِمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fayuwaffīhim ujūrahum wal-lahu lā yuḥibbu al-ẓālimīna
translations: then He will grant them in full
